blogs.name: Arne Bahlo
blogs.description: A software engineer that writes about technology.

blogs.name: Bjørn Stærk
blogs.description: A fellow Norwegian technologist that's also a book author, he some times does deep dives into the rabbit-hole of technology.

blogs.name: Brian Lovin
blogs.description: A designer that writes about web development, technology and gives design critiques to those who want it.

blogs.name: Christian Engelsen
blogs.description: A friend of mine that writes about technology, devops, machine learning and other shenanigans regarding technology.

blogs.name: Erik Johannes
blogs.description: Well written tech-person that writes about everything from plaintext to machine learning to reviewing running shoes.

blogs.name: Jim Nielsen
blogs.description: Frequent writer, writes about web technologies, everything from very specific CSS-properties to whole web-frameworks.

blogs.name: Tom MacWright
blogs.description: Writes about geo-specific stuff, cool gadgets and other cool tidbits.

blogs.name: Personvernsbloggen
blogs.description: A Norwegian blog about privacy, by a government-department, very interesting takes on social media and their responsibilities.

blogs.name: Mathias Haugsbø
blogs.description: A friend of mine that writes about technology, finance, mapping and button UX.

blogs.name: Nils Norman Haukås
blogs.description: A colleague of mine that writes about web development, ethics and much more.
